reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater well-made, soft, and very warm, with one mentioning it's perfect length for wearing with wide-leg jeans.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty, great quality sweater
items.body: This sweater is stylish and very well-made. It’s has gorgeous cable detail. It’s very soft, warm, and comfortable. I chose the light green color which is very pretty. It runs true to size for me. It gives some stretch, not stiff at all. It is light weight, not bulky which is great if you like tucking sweaters in your jeans a little. this is definitely good quality and highly recommend. Read more
items.author: Voula G.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Have no problems with returns at Amazon. The best
items.body: Haven’t worn it yet, but it looks good quality and fits perfect. Some very nice quality seems to be coming out of Amazon recently. Very pleased with them and their service, keep it up Read more
items.author: ANNE BARCANT

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft and pretty, but hangs instead of sits at the waist
items.body: First, this sweater is soft and cozy. Very comfortable on the skin. I ordered a small and it would be perfect except the bottom band part of the sweater is as wide as the sweater. The photos make the sweater look as if the bottom band is tighter allowing it to sit on the waist rather than hang down off of the waist. For that I’m returning. For reference I am 5’5”, 110lbs. Read more
items.author: Sheri

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars An outstanding sweater.
items.body: This is the fourth Dokotoo sweater I am buying, 4 different colors and I receive so many compliments about it... Unfortunately I missed the black one , I regret it , but now my size is not available any more. Very light but so warm, beautiful design of the cable knit, perfect sizing and fit, neither too long nor too short, which looks great with wide leg or skinny jeans...I could give 10 stars if I could. I live in them. If , by any chance, a black one in size small reappears, I would buy it in a minute. Thank you to Dokotoo for offering such an ideal sweater! Read more
items.author: Franki Bouy

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Meh….
items.body: To start, the quality of this sweater is actually pretty good. Nice weight to it, and the color is beautiful. The reason for the 3 stars is just that it is not very flattering. I’m 6ft tall and usually wear a large. I ordered a large, and it fits like a garbage bag. Just very loose and an excessive amount of fabric in the front that is not cute at all. I do wonder about ordering a smaller size, but at the end of the day, I just returned it and ordered a more flattering sweater. Read more
items.author: Emily Sena

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful! Love the colors and quality.
items.body: I bought this in the ivory and another in the light lavender. They're both beautiful, with a nice fit that isn't bulky and looks refined. I love the graceful sleeves and the cable knit design. The quality has been good. I wash them inside out in a lingerie/mesh laundry bag on gentle and lay flat to dry. They still look new! Perfect for work, dinner, lunch with friends. Looks pretty with layered necklaces, wide leg denim, and some boots. Read more
items.author: Emilije

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not as pictured and a huge disappointment
items.body: I really wanted to like this sweater but I could not get past the quality of the sweater I received vs the picture in the advertisement. The picture of the sweater showed a bulky yarn and the sweater that arrived was much thinner yarn, the cables are almost none existent on the actual piece. The sweater would not keep me warm because of the thinness of the yarn, it felt more like a spring or early fall weight for wear. The waistband was not tight but loose giving a more squared look on the body. The color was not as rich as the picture, granted pictures do not always show the true color value, they can appear richer in the picture. I let the sweater hang for three days to remove the creases from shipping and eventually had to steam the creases out. Still the sweater never gained the deep cables and puffy sleeves as shown. Such a huge disappointment. I would rate this zero if I could, I will be returning. Read more
items.author: imflyin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent!
items.body: Good quality, pretty vibrant color. Was very pleased with it. I could have ordered one size smaller. It fits a little larger than expected. Not itchy at all. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Red 1, Red, Khaki, Blue, Purple, Apricot, Black, Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
